Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its high quality and unique features, it's valued at $150 by many of our customers. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I would like to propose a special offer for you today. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for $135. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $15 compared to the standard price. I believe this offer will allow us both to benefit from this transaction. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
